group_1.textRight: Thank you for the Grief Seed.
I'm sorry... If only I weren't so weak...

group_1.textLeft: We're all in this together! [chara:200351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:200351:cheek_0][chara:200351:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:200351:lipSynch_1]And I'm glad@you were there with me!
I, I get so nervous by myself I can't stop@shaking.
There really aren't many Witches outside@Kamihama City anymore, are there?
Even that last one was just a minion...
I'm running low, so I'll need to make a trip@there again soon...
D-don't worry about the Grief Seed!

group_1.textRight: I can only gather enough Grief Seeds for@myself.

group_1.textLeft: I can't say I'm that great or anything,@though...
We should go ask Mami to train us!
You protected everyone at the hospital@yesterday, remember?
Even the main character in a story starts@out weak in the beginning.
But that's when they start their training!
It's your fighting spirit that matters!

group_1.narration: I should introduce her to Madoka.
Madoka has a gentle heart,@so I'm sure they'll become friends.
She's part of the Wings of the Magius,@but she's still a good person.
It's almost Wednesday, the day of@the chocolate party at Mami's house...
This is so nerve-wracking... @When should I give Madoka her chocolate?
She said we'd make chocolates at the party,@so maybe I should give it to her beforehand?
I should probably give Mami, Kyoko, and@Sayaka theirs then, too.
I can give Natsuki and the other Kamihama@girls theirs the next time I go there.
Once I start thinking about this I can't @sleep...
We all chose to become Magical Girls.
To change something we couldn't change,@to get something we couldn't get,@or to save someone precious to us.
That's exactly why we can all understand@each other.
I won't be in time for Valentine's Day, but I@want to give her some chocolate, too.
I wonder if it'll make her happy?
